message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $105.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $106 for the product.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer you the product for $109.
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $107 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make another small concession and offer you the product for $108.50.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $108 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $109.50.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering all the rounds of negotiation, I would like to finalize the deal at $109 for the product.
